anvil.description:
A simple anvil.
You can upgrade your tools with it.
anvil.mail: Found this tucked away in the guild's backroom and while you're not a blacksmith, I'm sure you can figure out how to upgrade your tools with it.^^^  -Marlon^^P.S. Let's keep this between us. No need for Clint to find out. %item bigobject {{item}} %%
